Title: Relates to the applicability of certain provisions with respect to persons injured in the use of scaffolding and other devices for use by employees
Summary: Relates to the applicability of certain provisions with respect to persons injured in the use of scaffolding and other devices for use by employees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to the applicability of certain provisions with respect to persons injured in the use of scaffolding and other devices for use by employees
